name: Bedminster Township v. Brauer et ux., Appellants

parties: Bedminster Township v. Brauer et ux., Appellants.

casebody.head_matter:
Bedminster Township v. Brauer et ux., Appellants.
Argued October 3, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Elizabeth Brauer and George K. Brauer, appellants, in propria personae.
John M. McClure, with him Smith, Mountenay & Wilson, for appellee.
November 28, 1969:
